overview: The film shows the performances of the best surfers in the world in various spots on the planet, passing through paradisiacal locations such as Indonesia, Tahiti, Hawaii, Jeffrey's Bay, Australia and Fernando de Noronha (PE).  Tracco says the new film is undoubtedly his best production to date. "I'm very happy to release Season 2. The film is international, with great underwater footage and top-notch surfing", says the videomaker.
title: Season: Volume 2
